response.overview: The story of how Richard Williams served as a coach to his daughters Venus and Serena, who will soon become two of the most legendary tennis players in history.
response.tagline: Venus, Serena and a plan for greatness.
response.title: King Richard

results.name: Will Smith Wins Best Actor for 'King Richard' | 94th Oscars
